data.taskTitle: Add toast notifications for hooks save/delete operations
Add toast notifications for hooks save/delete operations
data.approach: Add toast notifications to HooksEditor for save success/error, and optionally for add/remove entry operations. Will import successToast/errorToast from toasts.svelte.ts store and call them in the appropriate handlers.

data.taskTitle: Add toast notifications for hooks save/delete operations
summary: Added toast notification imports from toasts.svelte store
Added successToast on successful hooks save
Added errorToast on hooks save failure (both explicit failure and exception cases)

filesModified.description: Added toast notifications for hooks save operations

reviewFocus: Verify toast messages are clear and helpful

summary: Added successToast and errorToast imports to HooksEditor.svelte
Modified handleSave() to show toast on success or failure
Toast provides user feedback: success shows when saved, error shows when save fails
